attributes.additional_details:
I would like your help in getting the message of not starting to smoke to our kids in schools, as soon as their education starts.

We can only try to help their parents make the right choices however as adults we know they are less receptive and switch off to what sounds like preaching however, we can do everything we can to stop children starting to smoke in the first place.

By educating early we have a much better chance of success as their minds are much more receptive before they get into their teens and have more peer pressure and attitude to deal with.

You can help by signing this petition and getting the debate started.
You have a choice do you really want children or anyone to start smoking.

Thanks that's me off my soap box again.
Paul
